name: Banana Hunt (andeux123)
description:
Hi I'm Andeux123. 

This is a solo development game made by me, some assets like some tiles and background image are taken from the internet but all with legal sources, I Hope you like it, it's my first game jam but no game. There few Levels Because of time but hope you like my effort.

The R to reset Because this is a Buggy mess and if the velocity of the ball somehow breaks you have to restart everthing, and the last level the code break the restart button dosen't work I really don't have more time some :C

Thanks For Playing :D
